channel.title: Auto clickers
channel.description: well, on my server i dont allow autoing, and i got a folder that says flaggedauto, lots of people get into it but when i click their name it says they might have been autoing check the mouse logs. when i check mouse logs, nothing's there.. what do i do to find out if they actually auto clicked? :|

item.title: Auto clickers
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

no i’ve know many people to auto click. and coming up to me saying “my accounts logged in what do i do?” that means they clicked WAY to fast and their account’s stuck, meaning they auto clicked. also, how come my mouse logs arent doing anything? and i dont get anything in chat logs aswell?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto clickers
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

I know the ‘Flagged auto system’ is not good at all. More they likely no one autoed. People do not auto on Privet Servers, So just watch and talk.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto clickers
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Uhh…
Well if your server is a PK server, and you have people clicking on say a dummy, they will get put in the flaggedauto folder.

Read full topic
